Class ArchiveStory

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.core.ArchiveStory
public class ArchiveStory extends Object

This class is a data model for an AO3 story. ArchiveIngestor uses this to store relevant story information over time.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<ArchiveChapter>
    archiveChapters
    This attribute stores an ArrayList of ArchiveChapter objects.
    ArchiveStoryInfo
    archiveStoryInfo
    This attribute stores the ArchiveStoryInfo object representing story metadata.
    String
    creationHash
    This attribute stores the unique SHA-256 generated by the story's information.
    ZonedDateTime
    creationTimestamp
    This attribute stores the time and date when the story object is created.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ArchiveStory(ArchiveStoryInfo archiveStoryInfo, ArrayList<ArchiveChapter> archiveChapters)
    This constructor creates a story object with story metadata and chapter information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.json.JSONObject
    getJSONRep()
    This method retrieves a JSONObject representation of the story.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      This attribute stores the time and date when the story object is created.

      This attribute stores the unique SHA-256 generated by the story's information.

      This attribute stores the ArchiveStoryInfo object representing story metadata.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveStory

      public ArchiveStory(ArchiveStoryInfo archiveStoryInfo, ArrayList<ArchiveChapter> archiveChapters)

      This constructor creates a story object with story metadata and chapter information.

      Parameters:
      archiveStoryInfo - The parsed story metadata.
      archiveChapters - The parsed chapters.

  • Method Details

    • getJSONRep

      public org.json.JSONObject getJSONRep()

      This method retrieves a JSONObject representation of the story.

      Returns:
      JSONObject representation of the story.
